headline: NiSource Announces Investors Leadership Transition
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind. - NiSource Inc. today announced a transition in its Investors leadership. Chris Turnure, Senior Director of Investors, is leaving NiSource to pursue another opportunity effective...
